title: American Air Spurs Rally on Travel Revival
itunes:title: American Air Spurs Rally on Travel Revival
description:
Priya Duggal, Epidemiologist at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses studying the impact of Long Covid. Pacific Maritime Association CEO Jim McKenna talks about supply chain and labor challenges at U.S. west coast ports. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Media Reporter Gerry Smith share the details of Gerry's Businessweek story Everything You Need to Know About Netflix’s Big Miss. Bloomberg News U.S. Airlines Reporter Mary Schlangenstein shares news of an airline industry rally after American Airlines said its corporate and international flying are coming back and that it will be profitable this quarter. And we Drive to the Close with Amanda Agati, Chief Investment Officer at PNC Asset Management Group. Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
